title: Parents of Accused Michigan School Shooter Will Stand Trial, Judge Rules
sub_head: Coupleâ€™s 15-year-old son has been charged as an adult for November shooting that left four dead
body:
The parents of a 15-year-old boy charged with killing four students at his high school will stand trial on involuntary manslaughter charges, a Michigan judge ruled Thursday.
Rochester Hills District Court Judge Julie Nicholson said that Oakland County prosecutors had presented enough evidence to send the case against the parents to circuit court.
